snippet: The Connecticut city seems to ooze New England, but many fans remain faithful to their Super Bowl opponents, who played there for two seasons.
abstract: New Haven's location and sports history contribute to a split in fan loyalties between the New York Giants and the New England Patriots, rivals in the upcoming Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: The Connecticut city seems to ooze New England, but many fans remain faithful to their Super Bowl opponents, who played there for two seasons.

headline.seo: New Haven Has Divided Loyalties in Super Bowl
headline.main: In Giants-Patriots Loyalty, New Haven Is Midfield
headline.print_headline: In Giants-Patriots Loyalty, New Haven Is Midfield
